{{cpp/title|putwchar}}
{{cpp/io/c/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=cwchar|
std::wint_t putwchar( wchar_t ch );
}}
Writes a wide character {{c|ch}} to {{lc|stdout}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ch|wide character to be written}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|ch}} on success, {{lc|WEOF}} on failure.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;clocale&gt;
#include &lt;cstdio&gt;
#include &lt;cstdlib&gt;
#include &lt;cwchar&gt;
#include &lt;initializer_list&gt;

int main()
{
    std::setlocale(LC_ALL, "en_US.utf8");

    for (const wchar_t ch : {
        L'\u2200', // Unicode name: "FOR ALL"
        L'∀',
        L'\n'
        })
        if (std::putwchar(ch) == WEOF)
        {
            std::puts("I/O error in std::putwchar");
            return EXIT_FAILURE;
        }

    return EXIT_SUCCESS;
}
|p=true
|output=∀∀
}}
